EmailTemplate.subject: NCS Work Experience Invite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi!
We at NCS have noticed that you have amazing communication and public speaking skills...how would you like to join us for some work experience over May half term?
We have hundreds of young people coming on to our programme this year and our Sales team make lots of calls welcoming them all to NCS over the May half term. We would like to offer you the chance of joining the team for some work experience between the 31st May-3rd June . You can do anything from 1-4 days (we know you are busy with exams!) and will receive on the job training from our sales team!
You have been selected for this opportunity based on your amazing job on the programme, at being an NCS Ambassador or at other Graduate events and we would be thrilled to welcome you as part of our team.
Please let Mel, our Sales Team leader, know if you would be interested and when you might be available. Her email is mel.vasileva@the-challenge.org
Please do not just email back as these emails will not be monitored until 18th May!
Thanks so much!
Amy
